title: KÃ¤mppikset
overview: At the beginning of the series, Raimo Marjo's wife's 70th birthday is celebrated in the spirit of the Dallas series, but in the middle of the party, Marjo dies of an illness. Raimo's daughter Sanna is trying to get her to move out of her home mansion and sell the house because Sanna thinks her father can't take care of the big house alone. To prevent house deals, Raimo invents an emergency lie that a number of his youth friends and grandchildren, Amanda, are turning into his roommates. In the end, the emergency lie will come true.
